Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: FANCD2 protein levels were decreased for the variant NM_000141.4:c.786G>A.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed for each experiment.

Technical replicates.Description: Three technical replicates were performed in each assay.

Basic positive control.Description: A control experiment used a wild-type FANCD2 cDNA.

Basic negative control.Description: An empty vector served as a negative control.

Validation controls P/LP.Counts: N/A - Not specified in the text

Validation controls B/LB.Counts: N/A - Not specified in the text

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein level greater than 70% relative to wild-type
